text:
Peddlers--Flowers: An artificial flower market at Park Avenue and East 113th Street.

View 2 is on Catharine Street, on the Lower East Side.

View 1: P. L. Sperr
August 31, 1929

View 2: Gift of Beecher Ogden
November 3, 1941
title: Occupations - Peddlers - Flowers.

114-118 East 113th Street, south side, between Park and Lexington Avenues. Nos. 116 and 118 are three-story frame houses, the former with a brick front.

1932.

J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York, Negative No. 132,

(2)

July 6, 1934.
